interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Handmade Natural Sandalwood Hair Comb Anti-static Natural Logs Sandalwood Comb Protect Hair Untie Knotted Hair Vintage Design Comb (B)
Review Date: 2021/04/11
Store: JAVENPROLIU
Product Description: ['Natural anti-static sandalwood comb can promote blood circulation on the head and prevent hair from drying out and breaking. Protect your hair and scalp.It is a very good choice whether you use it yourself or give it to family and friends. High-quality combs are not only daily necessities, but also works of art. Our combs are made of complete sandalwood logs through cutting, shaping, carving patterns, grinding, polishing and other processes. The texture of each comb is unique. 100% handmade natural sandalwood comb, long-term use can prevent hair fall and avoid scalp injury, and solve the trouble of hair knotting when combing. Our comb is ultra-fine polishing technology, round and smooth teeth effectively prevent hair from breaking when combing, and easily comb the tangled hair. Long-term use promotes blood circulation in the head and really effectively maintains your hair health. Natural sandalwood contains a large number of small oxygen particles that are beneficial to hair, so frizzy hair becomes soft and smooth. Sandalwood effectively prevents hair static electricity (static electricity will cause hair to dry and accelerate the loss of water molecules in the hair), and prevent static electricity from bringing to the hair hurt. Our combs are solid and durable for a hundred years without decay. Thousands of manual and complex polishing have created the delicate texture of China Resources, which is made according to the standards of art to ensure the texture. Package 1 pcs Sandalwood comb']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 3.74 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '735192319264', 'Manufacturer': 'JAVENPROLIU'}
Review Text: This comb is nicely made with a smooth finish, the etching/carving on the handle is a beautiful intricate design and the wood bristles are gentle on my scalp especially compared to plastic combs. The comb I received has a very light sandalwood smell to it. Wood combs are know for being gentle on the scalp and hair and don't produce any static electricity. This is my first sandalwood comb and I am surprised how gentle it feels on my scalp.  This comb is an easy 5 stars.
Review Title: Beautiful, well made, non-static sandalwood hair comb
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Zen Rituals Pure Minerals Sea Bath Salts Set for Relaxation with Premium Essential Oils Aromatherapy Lavender, Tea Tree and Epsom Eucalyptus, Bundle Pack of 3 Bottles Zen Rituals {'Brand': 'Zen Rituals', 'Scent': 'Lavender, Tea Tree', 'Product Benefits': 'Relaxation,Aromatherapy', 'Unit Count': '105.6 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Product Dimensions': '6.79 x 8.98 x 2.99 inches; 7.12 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SEASETLAVTEATREAEUCALYPT', 'UPC': '791109148211', 'Manufacturer': 'Zen Rituals Product'} I wish all bath salts were like these. They dissolve fast and have a great aromatherapy effect in a hot tub. Plus they actually feel beneficial on my skin. Love them! I want more! Recieved as a gift, but LOVE the bath salts Butterfly Nail Art Decals Water Transfer Stickers, 22 Sheets Butterfly Nail Sticker DIY Nail Decals, 2 Set Butterfly Nail Glitter Holographic Stickers Reflected Butterfly Designs for Nails Supply B bangcool {'Surface Recommendation nail': '', '': 'Unit Count 1.00 Count', 'Shape Irregular': '', 'Brand': 'B bangcool', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches', 'Theme': 'Butterfly', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Pattern': 'Insects', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} This set is just mammoth...haha Perfect for anyone who is really into butterflies. And the sticky glue on the back of the butterflies is good enough that they can be used on more then just finger/toe nails, like cell phones, school books, lunch boxes, and places you might rather they didn't start showing up.

The collection is widely varied with silver, gold, multi colored, and different sizes and shapes, they are all relatively small to tiny, and there are no tweezers included, not that most folks don't have plenty of pairs lying around...

The butterfly stick on nail art is an excellent value and an easy 5 stars. A Flutter of Butterflies UV LED Nail Lamp – 128W Rapid-Curing Gel Nails Dryer for Manicures and Pedicures – Dual-Voltage with Extra-Long Cable, Multi-Language Manual – Professional Gel Lamp for Homes or Salons by OVLUX, Gold OVLUX {'Brand': 'OVLUX', 'Special Feature': 'Energy Efficient', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Connectivity Technology': 'USB', 'Package Dimensions': '9.4 x 8.3 x 4.3 inches; 1.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '765453999881'} What I like best is this is very easy to setup and use. The timer buttons turn it on and start the timer, press again and time is extended. The buttons are easy to press as well so I was able to get at them with wet nails. One thing that surprised me was the top and bottom come apart and are only lightly held together with magnets. I do wish they stayed together a little tighter, but they snap together easily so in the end its no big deal...I guess. This is my first at home nail dryer and I would say this drys about as fast as dryers at good nail salons, and its small enough that it stores in a drawer easily. super easy to use Vertra Black Lava Body Scrub - Exfoliating & detoxing body scrub with volcanic ash and charcoal, 3.4 Oz, purifying & softening with coconut and avocado oil Vertra {'Brand': 'Vertra', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Detox,Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.88 x 2.88 x 1.75 inches; 3.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '889297004621'} This isn't that scrub that you use every single day, its more for those occasional deep cleanings, and exfoliating. Or just for a good at home spa treatment. The size of the jar, and the amount of product is fairly small but it doesn't take much to get a good facial cleansing. To me, it smells very much like a Pina Coloda, but not over powering just a nice fresh scent.

The scrub itself is has a medium sized grit, and its feels fairly "sharp" against the skin. Also, this isn't great for rubbing on and then taking a long soak in a tub, it turns the water black. I was worried it would stain my towels, the floor, tub something, but it didn't.

This scrub is fairly specialized and is one of those love it or hate it things. I gave it 5 stars because the quality is excellent, the ingredients are top notch, and it has a pleasant smell. But it has to be tried before you'll know if its right for you. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Preference for Relaxation and Wellness Products:** The user continues to express a strong interest in relaxation and wellness items, particularly through sensory experiences that foster tranquility, including bath, aromatherapy, and now hair care products.

- **Positive Experience with Sensory Products:** They appreciate scents like lavender and sandalwood, favoring items that enhance physical relaxation and provide skincare benefits, recognizing the unique properties of natural materials in their self-care routine.

- **Commitment to Quality and Effectiveness:** The user values high-quality, effective products, reflecting a dedication to wellness, self-care, and the artistry of handmade items.

- **Desire for Repeat Purchases and Recommendations:** Their positive feedback indicates a strong likelihood of repurchasing and recommending similar products, reinforcing brand loyalty in both wellness and personal care categories.

- **Enjoyment of Gifted and Decorative Items:** They continue to appreciate receiving wellness products as gifts, further enhancing their positive associations with relaxation. Additionally, they show a growing enthusiasm for artistic and decorative elements, seeking ways to meld self-expression with wellness.

- **Interest in Gentle, Naturally-Made Tools:** The recent acquisition of a hair care product highlights their preference for gentle, non-static tools that promote hair health, emphasizing the interplay between functionality and aesthetic appeal in their routine.

Overall, the profile reflects a consistent commitment to quality relaxation and personal care products while embracing artistry and creativity in their wellness journey.
